001package com.github.sormuras.bach.workflow;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Project;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JavacCommand;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.ModulePathsOption;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectSpace;
008import java.nio.file.Files;
009import java.nio.file.Path;
010
011public abstract class AbstractSpaceWorkflow extends AbstractProjectWorkflow {
012
013  protected final ProjectSpace space;
014
015  protected AbstractSpaceWorkflow(Bach bach, Project project, ProjectSpace space) {
016    super(bach, project);
017    this.space = space;
018  }
019
020  protected JavacCommand.ReleaseOption computeReleaseOption() {
021    return JavacCommand.ReleaseOption.of(space.release());
022  }
023
024  protected int computeReleaseVersionFeatureNumber() {
025    return space.release() == 0 ? Runtime.version().feature() : space.release();
026  }
027
028  protected Path computeOutputDirectoryForModules(ProjectSpace space) {
029    return bach.path().workspace(space.name(), "modules");
030  }
031
032  protected ModulePathsOption computeModulePathsOption() {
033    var paths = ModulePathsOption.empty();
034    for (var parent : space.parents()) paths = paths.add(computeOutputDirectoryForModules(parent));
035    var externalModules = bach.path().externalModules();
036    if (Files.isDirectory(externalModules)) paths = paths.add(externalModules);
037    return paths;
038  }
039}
